Title: Authorizes the Mount Olive Pentecostal Church of Faith to file an application for retroactive real property tax exemption
Summary: Authorizes the Mount Olive Pentecostal Church of Faith, Inc. to file an application for retroactive real property tax exemption for the 2019--2020 assessment roll.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Mount Olive Pentecostal Church of Faith to file an application for retroactive real property tax exemption
